Grant - Charity / Nonprofit / NGO HTML5 Template

Version 1.0

  • created: 06/09/2015
  • latest update: 06/11/2015
  • by: Themelan
  • email: support@themelan.com

This is fully Bootstrap Charity HTML Template. This is created for Charity,Nonprofit, NGO etc.

HTML Structure

HTML Structure

Grant follows a simple coding structure. here is the sample:

 

<!DOCTYPE html>

<html prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en-gb" lang="en-gb" dir="ltr">

<head> 

        <!-- Your Stylesheets, Scripts & Title 
        ============================================= --> 
         ...   

</head> 
<body> 


     <!-- start top bar 
     ============================================= --> 
     <section id="sp-top-bar"> 


       .......
    
 
     </section>


     <!-- start header
     ============================================= -->

     <header id="sp-header">


          .......
    

     </header>
     <!-- end header -->



     <!-- start page title
     ============================================= -->

     <section id="sp-page-title">


           ......


      </section>
      <!-- end page title -->



      <!-- start main body
      ============================================= -->

      <section id="sp-main-body">


          ......

    

       </section>
       <!-- end main body -->



       <!-- start footer
       ============================================= -->

       <footer id="sp-footer">


             .............

    

        </footer>
        <!-- end footer -->



        <!-- start offcanvas menu
        ============================================= -->
        <div class="offcanvas-menu">


              .............

    

         </div>
         <!-- end offcanvas menu -->

</body> 
</html>

Home

Mobile Navigation Structure

<!-- start offcanvas menu -->

<div class="offcanvas-menu">

    <a href="#" class="close-offcanvas"><i class="fa fa-remove"></i></a>

    <div class="offcanvas-inner">

        <div class="sp-module ">

            <h3 class="sp-module-title">Search</h3>

            <div class="sp-module-content">

                <div class="search">

                    <form action="http://www.themelan.com/features/grant/blog" method="post">

                        <input name="searchword" maxlength="200" class="inputbox search-query" type="text" size="20" placeholder="Search ..." />

                        <input type="hidden" name="task" value="search" />

                        <input type="hidden" name="option" value="com_search" />

                        <input type="hidden" name="Itemid" value="278" />

                    </form>

                </div>

            </div>

        </div>

        <div class="sp-module ">

            <div class="sp-module-content">

                <ul class="nav menu">

Gallery page

If you want to change then have to go gallery.html. And you can change as your wish.

<section id="lan_gallery" class="sppb-section">

                            <div class="sppb-container">

                                <div class="sppb-row">

                                    <div class="sppb-col-sm-12">

                                        <div class="sppb-addon-container"  data-sppb-wow-duration="300ms">

                                            <div class="sppb-addon sppb-addon-module ">

                                                <div class="sppb-addon-content">

                                                    <div id="sp-sig137" class="sp-sig grand_gallary">

                                                        <a href="images/gallery-page/l1.jpg"  title="l1">

                                                            <div class="sp_img_wrapper">

                                                                <img class="sp_simple_gallery" src="images/gallery-page/thumbs/l1.jpg" alt="l1" />

                                                                        <div class="overlay_content">

                                                                            <i class="icon-picture"></i>

                                                                        </div>

                                                                    </div>

                                                                </div>

                                                            </div>

Donate page

<div class="donate-top">

                            <div class="cmdonation">

                                <form class="pure-form pure-form-aligned" method="post" action="http://www.themelan.com/features/grant/index.php?option=com_cmdonation&amp;task=donation.submit">

                                    <fieldset>

                                        <div class="pure-control-group">

                                            <label for="amount">Amount</label>

                                                 <span class="pure-input-prepend">

                                                       <span class="add-on">$</span>

                                                       <input type="text" placeholder="Amount" name="amount" id="amount">

                                                 </span>

                                        </div>


                                        <div class="pure-control-group">

                                            <label></label>

                                            <input type="checkbox" value="1" class="inputbox" name="anonymous" id="anonymous"> Donate as anonymous </div>


                                        <div class="pure-control-group">

                                            <label>Payment method</label>

                                            <input type="radio" name="payment_method" id="payment_method_paypalproexpress" value="paypalproexpress"> PayPal Payments Pro (Express Checkout)

                                        </div>


                                        <div class="pure-control-group">

                                            <label></label>

                                            <input type="checkbox" value="1" class="inputbox" name="recurring" id="recurring"> Make recurring donation </div>


                                        <div class="pure-control-group" id="recurringCycles" style="display: none">

                                            <label class="pure-label-top-aligned">Recurring cycle</label>

                                            </div>

                                        </div>

                                    </fieldset>

                                    <input type="hidden" name="campaign_id" value="1" />

                                    <input type="hidden" name="return_url" value="" />

                                </form>

                            </div>

                        </div>

 

recurringCycles:

window.onload = function() {

        var cycles = document.getElementById('recurringCycles');


        var recurring = document.getElementById('recurring');


        showCycles(recurring.checked);


        recurring.onchange = function() {

            showCycles(recurring.checked);

        };


        function showCycles(checked) {

            if (checked) {

                cycles.style.display = '';

            } else {

                cycles.style.display = 'none';

            }

        }

    }

Coming Soon

If you want to change coming soon time then have to go coming-soon.html. And you can change as your wish.

Script

jQuery(function($) {

   $('#sp-comingsoon-countdown').countdown('2018/10/05', function(event) {

                $(this).html(event.strftime('<div class="days"><span class="number">%-D</span><span class="string">%!D:Day,Days;</span></div><div class="hours"><span class="number">%H</span><span class="string">%!H:Hour,Hours;</span></div><div class="minutes"><span class="number">%M</span><span class="string">%!M:Minute,Minutes;</span></div><div class="seconds"><span class="number">%S</span><span class="string">%!S:Second,Seconds;</span></div>'));

  });

  });

 

 

Bootstrap Grid

Bootstrap GRID

Grant is based on Bootstrap 3.1 and uses the default Bootstrap 12 column grid system for the underlying structure of each section. Each use of the grid should be wrapped in both a container and row element. Below is a brief example for a section with three equal columns (3 for tablet and up, 6 for smartphones).

 

<div class="container">

   <div class="row">

     <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6">...</div>

     <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6">...</div>

     <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6">...</div>

   </div>

</div>

 

For a more detailed explanation of the Bootstrap grid - see the Bootstrap documentation here

Icons

Grant makes use of the Font-Awesome icon set. Using these icons requires you to follow simple syntax using the Font Awesome predefined icon codes. For a list of all available icon codes, look Here.

Syntax for icons is as follows:

 

<i class="fa fa-facebook"></i>

This would result in:

 

 

Features

  • Full Bootstrap Support
  • Revolution Slider
  • Smooth Scrolling
  • HTML5 & CSS3
  • Awesome Image gallery
  • Fully compatible with all major browsers
  • SEO friendly code structure
  • Well Structered code
  • Well Documented.

  1. Images used in preview from http://hdwallpapersfactory.com/
  2. Font Awesome Icons – https://github.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome/
